choices: Starkiller finds a place to rest in a part of the city the massacre hadn't been
Yoda stays where he is, watching
1.content:
Starkiller bowed before his master, Darth Vader. "Come, my apprentice, we must find a place to rest, I grow weary of this place." As one's view went out, they would notice the masses of dead foot soldiers piled in circles around them. Apparently one had stopped Lord Vader to make a sneering comment, and caught a lightsaber in the gut, which another guard saw and called the other guards.
Yoda was on a hilltop overlooking the city they were in, watching. "Watch them I must, or murder more, they will." Yoda said, holding his cane.
1.title: The starwars induction

info.brief_description: A deeper story with the characters from Soul Calibur IV, all 3 starwars chars included
info.description:
Rules:
1) no main characters die, but they can be severely injured, unless they haven't had a main role in the story so far, then they can die.
2) There are multiple Lizardmen, so expect more.
3) Make your actions realistic and with a reason, if they get drunk, they get drunk. Why they got drunk? They're prone to it, or they're depressed.
4)Fights can be avoided or stopped, this is more about story than fighting, but fighting is going to be common, considering it's soul calibur
5)Everyone has a weak point
6) No one is invincible.
7) have fun
